data.title: Felix Hoffmann - Head Of Product at LeanIX
data.meta_description: Felix Hoffmann has a diverse work experience across multiple companies.
data.text:
Felix Hoffmann has a diverse work experience across multiple companies. Felix started their career in 2012 as a Senior Consultant at Comma Soft AG, where they worked until 2016. In 2016, they joined CSC Computer Systems Consulting GmbH as a Senior Professional: Cyber Security, a role they held until 2017. Later that year, they joined LeanIX as a Data Scientist and was responsible for this role until 2018. From 2018 to 2020, they served as a Product Manager at LeanIX. In 2020, they were promoted to Team Leading Product Manager at the same company. Currently, they hold the position of Head of Product at LeanIX, starting from April 2022.

Felix Hoffmann attended The University of Bonn from 2008 to 2012, earning a Diplom in Mathematik with a focus on Mathematik und Informatik. Felix further obtained additional certifications in LeanIX Certified EA Practitioner from LeanIX in September 2020 and EFSET Quick English Check - Score: Advanced/Proficient (CEFR C1/C2) from EF Education First.
